person.persName: Berry S. Young (Crittenden County, Kentucky, County Clerk)

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, tavernkeeper and county clerk. Virginia native. Married Narcissa "Nancy" Young in Livingston County, Kentucky, on July 19, 1838. Father of Matilda J. Young, Nancy M. Young, Mary Helen Young, and Harriet A. Young. Tavernkeeper in Crittenden County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Crittenden County in 1850. County court clerk in Crittenden County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Crittenden County in 1860. County court clerk in Crittenden County in 1864. Appointed Major and Paymaster to U.S. Volunteers in Kentucky on April 21, 1864. Resigned due to disability on February 24, 1865.
